section.title: Example User Interface Plug-in Deployment
section.para: Follow these instructions to create a user interface plug-in that runs a Hello World! program when you sign in to the Red Hat Virtualization Manager administration portal.

step.para: Create a plug-in descriptor by creating the following file in the Manager at /usr/share/ovirt-engine/ui-plugins/helloWorld.json:
Create the plug-in host page by creating the following file in the Manager at /usr/share/ovirt-engine/ui-plugins/hello-files/start.html:
step.screen:
<!DOCTYPE html><html><head>
<script>
    var api = parent.pluginApi('HelloWorld');
    api.register({
	UiInit: function() { window.alert('Hello world'); }
    });
    api.ready();
</script>
</head><body></body></html>
